title: Idea Recolor of Mecha kha'zix
body: I heard about Riot is going to do the recolor of the skins . I very like to play Kha'zix as Mecha Kha'zix , now I would like to share my favorite Mecha Kha'zix that i found online . I am just hoping Riot would accept my idea of the recolor of Mecha Kha'zix .And others .{{champion:121}}

replies.body: Do a hot pink chroma on full metal Pantheon please!

That would be the best thing! Especially if the Chroma packs were for people with the highest level of Mastery in the champ.
You get into the loading screen and see the pink pantheon and you just go "Oh no..."
Yeah it would be cool if you got chroma packs for the highest level of mastery and that means most people will have them for their mains. Either way I'm definitely getting one for {{champion:121}}
Ooh! The purple is a cool idea o_o!  What other colors would you bundle in the pack?

> [{quoted}](name=Goilo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dmakL8HI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-10T20:41:46.837+0000)
>
> Do a hot pink chroma on full metal Pantheon please!

WE NEED THIS RIGHT NOW! I'd also want a chroma that makes the armor Silver-chromed (SUPER SHINY, and not like the old version) and another one that makes the armor super rusty.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dmakL8HI,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-10T23:30:30.101+0000)
>
> Ooh! The purple is a cool idea o_o!  What other colors would you bundle in the pack?

I would probably be interested in seeing a version of Green perhaps, either Dark Green or regular green.

As mentioned by Keagn, I also think that Cyan would be a good color, or possibly a darker shade of it.

To me, Mecha Kha'Zix seem to fit in colors that fit with Neon-light. But hey, maybe that's just me.

I would have a gold {{champion:121}} with silver outlines/details and also a dark green {{champion:121}} with bright green outlines/details and finally a black {{champion:121}} with red details/outlines chroma pack. I also think a brown and red {{champion:121}} may look okay as well :3. I think that when he evolves his R the colour changes again for example the could have a bronze and silver {{champion:121}}  that changes to gold when his R is evolved.

I'd say, for a mecha zix chroma set:

black and purple (as displayed)
forest green and neon yellow green (think acid/venom theme)
crimson and black (black energy would look pretty cool)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dmakL8HI,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-10T23:30:30.101+0000)

This might not be intended for me, but I think a sea green and cyan color variation would be cool too. Maybe a bronze shell color, but when he evolves his R his shell becomes a goldish tint. Could maybe vaguely reference MK by making one gold with green light colors, and one rust-red with blue light colors. But from what I understand, changing the color of his glowing elements (like his claws specifically) may prove problematic when it comes to the particles and whatnot.
Would Riot make this for us ? {{champion:121}}
yea i also think that purple is cool
what other colors ?  Deep black and blue or blood something ...

I'd have a chroma colour that makes him match closer to the other Mecha skins, like Mecha Aatrox's blue armor. Evolving R would turn him colourful red and orange to fit the other skins' colour changes.
